COURSE_PAGE.TITLE: Basic Radiation Protection Courses

INTRO.PARAGRAPH1: Ionizing radiation is present in various areas such as medicine, veterinary, industry, and research. Radiation protection is essential to ensure safety against its harmful effects.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH2: This course is part of the Ministry of Health requirements according to Executive Decree No. 44653-S, and is aimed at promoting a culture of radiation safety in medical, industrial, and veterinary practices.

OBJECTIVES.TITLE: Learning objectives
OBJECTIVES.ITEM1: Understand dosimetric magnitudes and their units.
OBJECTIVES.ITEM2: Become familiar with radiation detectors and their principles.
OBJECTIVES.ITEM3: Understand biological effects of radiation exposure.
OBJECTIVES.ITEM5: Master regulatory infrastructure and safe use of sources.

EDUCATION.TITLE: Academic background
EDUCATION.ITEM1: Nuclear Engineering - Higher Institute of Technologies and Applied Sciences, Cuba (2013)
EDUCATION.ITEM2: Master’s in Medical Physics - University of Costa Rica (2020)

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Work experience
EXPERIENCE.ITEM1: Medical physicist - Hospital México, CCSS (2021 - present)
EXPERIENCE.ITEM2: Medical physicist - Quality Control and Radiation Protection Area - CCSS (2018 - 2021)
EXPERIENCE.ITEM3: Medical physicist - Radiotherapy and Nuclear Medicine - Hospital Lenin, Cuba (2013 - 2016)

COURSE_PAGE.AUTHORIZATION: Authorized by the Ministry of Health under code DPRSA-UPR-0168-2023-S, ID number 801480648.

RESULTS.TITLE: Expected results
RESULTS.ITEM1: Improve understanding of radiation protection according to the area of interest.
RESULTS.ITEM2: Understand the interaction of ionizing radiation with matter.
RESULTS.ITEM3: Recognize the benefits and biological effects of ionizing radiation.
RESULTS.ITEM4: Apply national standards and international recommendations.

INTRO.PARAGRAPH1: At PRAD Academy, we value your trust and protect your personal information in accordance with the highest standards of privacy and security.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH2: Your data is processed as follows: the information you provide is used exclusively to manage your registration, course participation, certificate issuance, and academic or informational communications.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH3: Data is treated confidentially, stored on secure servers, and never shared with third parties without your express consent, unless legally required.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH4: For more details, we want you to understand how we process your data and to be aware of your rights and options.

SECTION1.TITLE: 1. Identity of the Data Controller
SECTION1.DESCRIPTION: PRAD Academy (hereinafter, “the Platform”) is responsible for the processing and protection of personal data provided by users through the website, registration forms, and any other electronic means related to its online training services.

A.TITLE: A. Personal data collected will be processed for the following purposes:
A.ITEM1: Manage the user’s registration, access, and participation in the courses offered by the Platform.
A.ITEM2: Issue certificates of completion corresponding to the course taken.
A.ITEM3: Facilitate communication between the user and the Platform for notifications, technical support, and updates of academic information.
A.ITEM4: Administer billing and receipts for completed transactions.
A.ITEM5: Comply with legal, contractual, and administrative obligations arising from the relationship with the user.

B.TITLE: B. Personal data collected will NOT be processed for the following purposes:
B.ITEM1: Conduct satisfaction surveys and statistical analyses to improve services.
B.ITEM2: Send informational or promotional communications about new courses, programs, or academic activities.

SECTION3.TITLE: 3. Personal Data Collected
SECTION3.DESCRIPTION: To issue certificates of completion, provide technical support, or send academic communications, PRAD Academy will request the following data:
SECTION3.ITEM1: Identification data: full name, identity document.
SECTION3.ITEM2: Contact data: email address, phone number (optional).
SECTION3.ITEM3: Academic data: course history, grades, issued certificates.
SECTION3.ITEM4: Payment data: billing information and payment receipts.

SECTION4.TITLE: 4. Legal Basis and Consent
SECTION4.DESCRIPTION: The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with the free, express, and informed consent of the data subject, granted upon registering and using the Platform’s courses.

SECTION5.TITLE: 5. Security Measures
SECTION5.PARAGRAPH1: PRAD Academy implements appropriate technical, administrative, and organizational measures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of personal data.
SECTION5.PARAGRAPH2: Data is handled confidentially, stored on secure servers, and never shared with third parties without your express consent, unless legally required.
SECTION5.PARAGRAPH3: Sensitive data (such as payment data) is NOT processed through the Platform; each user makes payments individually according to the chosen method. PRAD Academy only records the payment receipt provided by the user.

SECTION6.TITLE: 6. Data Retention
SECTION6.PARAGRAPH1: PRAD Academy will retain users’ personal data for the time necessary to maintain the academic record, the validity of issued certificates, and compliance with course renewal requirements, which must be every 2 years in accordance with national regulations and continuous training standards in radiation protection.
SECTION6.PARAGRAPH2: This information will remain active and safeguarded in our systems while the user maintains an academic or administrative relationship with the Platform, or as necessary for legal, audit, or verification purposes of issued certifications.
SECTION6.PARAGRAPH3: However, the user may request the deletion or cancellation of their personal data, in accordance with the procedure established in section 7 (Data Subjects’ Rights), in which case PRAD Academy will proceed with secure deletion, except when there is a legal or administrative obligation requiring retention for an additional period.

SECTION7.TITLE: 7. Data Subjects’ Rights
SECTION7.DESCRIPTION: The data subject has the right to:
SECTION7.RIGHT_ACCESS: the information held by the Platform about them.
SECTION7.RIGHT_RECTIFY: their data when it is inaccurate or incomplete.
SECTION7.RIGHT_DELETE: or delete their data when the course has ended or when it is no longer necessary for the declared purposes.
SECTION7.CONTACT_PREFIX: These rights may be exercised by sending a written request to:
SECTION7.CONTACT_SUFFIX: , indicating full name, contact method, and the right you wish to exercise.
SECTION7.RESPONSE: PRAD Academy will respond within a maximum of 5 calendar days.

SECTION8.TITLE: 8. Transfer and Communication of Data to Third Parties
SECTION8.DESCRIPTION: PRAD Academy will NOT share personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
SECTION8.ITEM1: When there is a legal, administrative, or judicial obligation requiring it.
SECTION8.ITEM2: When the user has given explicit consent.
SECTION8.PARAGRAPH: In such cases, it will be ensured that recipient third parties have policies and adequate levels of personal data protection.

SECTION9.TITLE: 9. Changes to the Privacy Policy
SECTION9.PARAGRAPH1: PRAD Academy reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy to adapt it to legislative, technological, or operational changes of the Platform.
SECTION9.PARAGRAPH2: Any changes will be published on the website with the date of the last update and will take effect upon publication.
